lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch outran A. J. Allmendinger to the finish for his first Nascar Sprint Cup Series victory at Martinsville Speedway and a sweep of the two-race weekend at the Virginia track.
snippet: Kyle Busch outran A. J. Allmendinger to the finish for his first Nascar Sprint Cup Series victory at Martinsville Speedway and a sweep of the two-race weekend at the Virginia track.
abstract: Kyle Busch wins Nascar Sprint Cup STP 500 auto race at Martinsville Speedway; other racing news.
